official_title: A bill to amend the Joint Resolution of October 19, 1965, to provide additional authorization for the Library of Congress James Madison Memorial Building.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #319 (188-186)) Increases to $138,815,000 the authorization of appropriations for the Library of Congress James Madison Memorial Building.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Joint Resolution of October 19, 1965, to provide additional authorization for the Library of Congress James Madison Memorial Building.
